title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message: Hi. I have a 820-3437 with no Trackpad/Keyboard in Operating System except for power button. Both keyboard and trackpad will work pre - O.S. External KB/Mouse will work fine. Have tried with multiple Operating Systems. Thank you. Have a good one.

title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message: Check SPI lines on trackpad connector an resistors R4850 to R4853.....

title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message:
Hi. Thank you.

pn 2 - 0
pn 7 - Jumps everywhere between .015 - .005
pn 9 - .003
pn 11, 12, 13 - Jumps everywehere between 3.3 - 2.7

R4850 33.8 Ohm
R4853 33.8 Ohm

Thanks again.

title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message:
I mean R4850, R4851, R4852 and R4853......

This is water damage??? Inpect for corrosion on connector, trackpad side and LB side....

title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message:
R4851 and R4852 are within 33 Ohms as well.

Areas are pretty clean. Aside from discoloration on via's.  [URL]https://goo.gl/photos/qHkf4st1zWA4fJaW6[/URL]

Thanks.

title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message:
Put back together. It seems to be working again.

pn 2 - 0
pn 7 - 0
pn 9 - .003
pn 11 - 3.297
pn 12 - 3.326
pn 13 - 3.309

title: 820-3437 No TP/KB
message: The usual bad TP cable/corrosion in the connectors.
